summary:
Creature Package for for Modders

This package contains only the meshes and textures along with the animations, contains no esp, so are only resurces not a working mod
descriptionHtml:
Creature Package  for for Modders
This package contains only the meshes and textures along with the animations, contains no esp, so are only resurces not a  working  mod



This package contains:

a new wolf
3 types of a new ogre
and an ice wraith retextured

feel free to use my work anywhere you want, just remember to give me proper credit :)



(to be honest, I do not know who is the creator of the meshes I used the dark dog, I found them in a site of dawnloads if anyone knows who the creator or if he does not want me to use your work, please let me know that I withdraw immediately.)

(on models of bioware, I sent an email to their head office and they gave me permission to post them, since they were not sold! then do not bother to use them, if bioware change ideai, I notice here!)

thanks to:
penguinchao  - for meshes of ice wraith
BioWare - for meshes of pride demon
bathesda - for amazing game, and textures
all makers of NifSkope
diego4fun - for animations


(sorry my very bad english)
author: orionh4ck3r
